title: [Ruins, Feasting Terrace]
description: Stone tables flanked by low benches are engraved with intricate runes.  An iron trough runs down the length of every table, all devoid of any contents but bearing dark stains.  The atoll waters below shine a vibrant crystal blue accented with darker blue swirls.

Large stone tables are lined with low stone benches, each accented with intricate runes.  An iron trough runs down the length of each table, devoid of any contents but each bearing dark stains.  The atoll waters below shine a vibrant crystal blue accented with darker blue swirls.
paths: Obvious paths: north, south, southwest, northwest
